title: Metal Slug Anthology
description:
<{Metal Slug Anthology}>

Game: Metal Slug Anthology
Game Language: English
US Game Release Date: 28 March 2007
JP Game Release Date: 31 May 2007
EU Game Release Date: Not yet available
AU Game Release Date: 7 June 2008
Game Region: NTSC|U/C <USA>

How to burn:

You will need:

 Blank DVD R disc
 DVD recorder
 PS2 with modchip
 DVD Decrypter
 This torrent downloaded on your computer

Insert your blank DVD into your DVD recorder and open up DVD Decrypter.
Click Mode which is in between View and Mode, go to ISO and make sure it is on Write.
Under Source browse for the ISO file you downloaded from this torrent and it should say METALSLUGANTHOLOGY.ISO.
Under the description where all the writing is, make sure your Write Speed is on 2.4x.
Now hit the Write button which looks like a Hard drive with an arrow pointing at a CD.
Wait for it to finish, once finished eject disc, insert into PS2 with modchip.

Play and enjoy!

METAL SLUG ANTHOLOGY
All Metal Slug games in one.
Metal Slug 1,2,3,X,4,5,6.
